Level.title: Level
Level.description: Represents a game level with its associated properties.

name.description: Name of the level (e.g., Easy, Medium, Hard, Impossible).

arrivalTime.description: Time in seconds before reaching Earth for this level.

engineOverloadTime.description: Time in seconds before the engine overloads for this level.

problemFrequency.description: Frequency in seconds at which problems appear in this level.

achievementId.description: Reference to the Achievement earned upon completion of this level.

unlocksNextLevelId.description: Reference to the next Level unlocked upon completion of this level. Null if it unlocks end credits.

menuDescription.description: Description displayed in the menu for this level.

Achievement.title: Achievement
Achievement.description: Represents an achievement earned by the player.

title.description: Title of the achievement (e.g., First Step, Wasn't that hard?).

completionDateTime.description: Date and time when the achievement was completed.

badgeColor.description: Color of the badge representing the achievement (gray = locked, gold = unlocked).

PlayerProgress.title: PlayerProgress
PlayerProgress.description: Represents the player's overall progress in the game.

unlockedLevelIds.description: References to Levels unlocked by the player.

completedAchievementIds.description: References to Achievements completed by the player.

endCreditsUnlocked.description: Indicates whether the end credits have been unlocked.

completionDateTimes.description: A map of achievement IDs to their completion date-time strings.

UserProfile.title: User Profile
UserProfile.description: Stores public information about a user.

email.description: The user's email address, kept private by security rules.

createdAt.description: The timestamp of when the user account was created.

Username.title: Username
Username.description: A document that maps a username to a user's UID to enforce uniqueness.

uid.description: The UID of the user who owns this username.

definition.description: Stores the definitions for each level in the game.
Stores the definitions for each achievement in the game.
Stores the public profile for each user, including their username.
Stores the private progress data for each player.
A collection to enforce unique usernames. The document ID is the username (lowercase), and it stores the UID of the user.
